pages.text: Hats is a customisable collectable mod bringing in plenty of, as the name suggests, HATS for your player to wear.
See any strange looking mobs with some funny hat on? Kill it and you can add the hat to your wearable/customizable collection! You can even trade with other players.
Every hat is able to have its colour changed within the GUI and can be customised with their accessories. Trade with others too!
